summary: A dim-witted busboy finds acclaim as an artist for a plaster-covered dead cat that is mistaken as a skillful statuette. The desire for more praise soon leads to an increasingly deadly series of works.
cast: Dick Miller|Barboura Morris|Antony Carbone|Julian Burton|Ed Nelson|John Brinkley|John Herman Shaner|Judy Bamber|Myrtle Vail|Bert Convy|Jhean Burton|Bruno VeSota|Lynn Storey|Tom Daly|Alex Hassilev|George Hoagland|Paul Horn|Kenner G. Kemp|Perk Lazelle|Sheila Noonan|Monty O'Grady|Murray Pollack|Jeffrey Sayre|Henry Travis
keywords: sculptor|dead cat|beatnik|suicide by hanging|statue of a cat
title: Un cubo de sangre
